channel.title: Ards on Keith's Diary and Other Stuff
channel.description: Recent content in Ards on Keith's Diary and Other Stuff

item.title: Newtownards Part Two
item.description: Monday 14th April Karen was good enough to drop us of at Enterprise to collect the hire van. Uneventful trip to Bangor with one stop for coffee and fuel

item.title: Newtownards Part One
item.description: With only a few day’s between Garth and Helena leaving we were running against the clock to get ready for our trip to Newtownards and Cork.

item.title: Ready for Rental
item.description: We flew to Dublin on Monday 30th and Flo’s brother Harry met us at the Airport with Kaths car, we then made good speed to Newtownards an settle in to get ready for the week ahead.

item.title: Quick Trip Home
item.description: This turned out to be a month of changes. Flo was due to go home meet up with some friends and then travel to Rosslare and meet Cath, Frank and Louise. That was until Kathleen died on Monday 7th at 14:00.
